SetType.name: SetType
SetType.description:
Specify the section type of the current section. The section type specifies how the contents of the current
section shall be placed relative to the previous section.

WordprocessingML supports five distinct types of section breaks:

  • Next page section breaks (the default if type is not specified), which begin the new section on the
    following page.
  • Odd page section breaks, which begin the new section on the next odd-numbered page.
  • Even page section breaks, which begin the new section on the next even-numbered page.
  • Continuous section breaks, which begin the new section on the following paragraph. This means that
    continuous section breaks might not specify certain page-level section properties, since they shall be
    inherited from the following section. These breaks, however, can specify other section properties, such
    as line numbering and footnote/endnote settings.
  • Column section breaks, which begin the new section on the next column on the page.

params.name: sType
params.description: Type of the section break

SetEqualColumns.name: SetEqualColumns
SetEqualColumns.description: Specify that all text columns in the current section are of equal width.

params.name: nCount
params.description: Number of columns.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: Distance between columns measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetNotEqualColumns.name: SetNotEqualColumns
SetNotEqualColumns.description:
Set all columns of this section are of different widths. Count of columns are equal length of
aWidth array. The length of aSpaces array MUST BE (aWidth.length -
1).

params.name: aWidths
params.description: An array of column width values measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: aSpaces
params.description: An array of distances values between the columns measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetPageSize.name: SetPageSize
SetPageSize.description: Specify the properties (size and orientation) for all pages in the current section.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The page width measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The page height measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: isPortrait
params.description: Specifies the orientation of all pages in this section (if set to true then the portrait orientation is chosen).

SetPageMargins.name: SetPageMargins
SetPageMargins.description: Specify the page margins for all pages in this section.

params.name: nLeft
params.description: The left margin width measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: nTop
params.description: The top margin height measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: nRight
params.description: The right margin width measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: nBottom
params.description: The bottom margin height measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetHeaderDistance.name: SetHeaderDistance
SetHeaderDistance.description: Specify the distance from the top edge of the page to the top edge of the header.

params.name: nDistance
params.description: The distance from the top edge of the page to the top edge of the header measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetFooterDistance.name: SetFooterDistance
SetFooterDistance.description:
Specify the distance from the bottom edge of the page to the bottom edge of the footer.
footer.

params.name: nDistance
params.description:
The distance from the bottom edge of the page to the bottom edge of the footer measured
in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

GetHeader.name: GetHeader
GetHeader.description: Get the content for the specified header type.

params.name: sType
params.description: Type of header to get the content from.

params.name: isCreate
params.description:
Whether to create a new header or not with the specified header type in case
no header with such a type could be found in the current section.

RemoveHeader.name: RemoveHeader
RemoveHeader.description:
Remove the header of the specified type from the current section. After removal the header will be inherited from
the previous section or, if this is the first section in the document, no header of the specified type will be present.

params.name: sType
params.description: Type of header to be removed.

GetFooter.name: GetFooter
GetFooter.description: Get the content for the specified footer type.

params.name: sType
params.description: Type of footer to get the content from.

params.name: isCreate
params.description:
Whether to create a new footer or not with the specified footer type in case
no footer with such a type could be found in the current section.

RemoveFooter.name: RemoveFooter
RemoveFooter.description:
Remove a footer of the specified type from the current section. After removing the footer will be inherited from
the previous section or, if this is the first section in the document, there won't be no footer of the specified
type.

params.name: sType
params.description: Type of footer.

SetTitlePage.name: SetTitlePage
SetTitlePage.description: Specify whether the current section in this document have different header and footer for the section first page.

params.name: isTitlePage
params.description: If true the first page of the section will have header and footer that will differ from the other pages of the same section.
